title: Agalaadhe Agalathey Lyrics Settai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Agalaadhe agalaadhe
Lyrics: Madhan Karky
Singer: Vijay Prakash, Megah
MOvie: Settai
Music: S Thaman		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Agalaadhe agalaadhe
azhage nee agalaadhey
en kannai vittu penne agalaadhey
nee illa endraal vazhve migazhaadhey

Dhinam dhinam vaanam sendru
parakkum vimaanam ondru
unnai unnai modhum ipodhu

Suda suda mutham indru
kisu kisu seidhi ondru
adikadi vandhaal thappedhu

Agalaadhe agalaadhe
azhage nee agalaadhey
en kannai vittu penne agalaadhey
nee illa endraal vazhve migazhaadhey

Yeraalamaaga kaadhal
dhaaraalamaaga naanum
verenna ketkiraai ..ov..ov...
naavil vilum thaeneer
nee thinnathaaney thinarukiraai

Ye. adhiradi poove
nee varumvarai
vazhvinil rusigaram yedhumillai
thaththalikiren nee thelikiraai
meendum varuvadhu perum thollai

Dhinam dhinam vaanam sendru
parakkum vimaanam ondru
unnai unnai modhum ipodhu

Suda suda mutham indru
kisu kisu seidhi ondru
adikadi vandhaal thappedhu

Kaatrile oru patchipole
kadhalil en nenjinmele
megamaai naan aanen unnaale

Agalaadhe agalaadhe
azhage nee agalaadhey
en kannai vittu penne agalaadhey
